Docs.param: The ID of the policy assignment to create. Use the format '/{scope}/providers/Microsoft.Authorization/policyAssignments/{policy-assignment-name}'.
Parameters for policy assignment.

Docs.summary: Creates a policy assignment by ID.
Docs.remarks: Policy assignments are inherited by child resources. For example, when you apply a policy to a resource group that policy is assigned to all resources in the group. When providing a scope for the assigment, use '/subscriptions/{subscription-id}/' for subscriptions, '/subscriptions/{subscription-id}/resourceGroups/{resource-group-name}' for resource groups, and '/subscriptions/{subscription-id}/resourceGroups/{resource-group-name}/providers/{resource-provider-namespace}/{resource-type}/{resource-name}' for resources.
Docs.exception: Thrown when the operation returned an invalid status code
Thrown when unable to deserialize the response
Thrown when a required parameter is null
